books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again, is a children's fantasy novel written by English author J.R.R. Tolkien. It is the first of seven planned novels in the Tolkien canon and, along with The Two Towers and The Return of the King, is one of the most popular fantasy novels ever written, sold more than 50 million copies, and has been translated into almost every major language.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone is a fantasy novel written by British author J.K. Rowling. It is the first novel in the Harry Potter series and Rowling's debut novel, first published in 1997. The novel follows Harry Potter, a young wizard who discovers his magical heritage on a trip to England for the purpose of study at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where he meets a series of characters who become his friends.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

books.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them is a fantasy novel written by British author J.K. Rowling. It is the fifth novel in the Harry Potter series and Rowling's fifth novel, published in 2005. The novel follows the adventures of the magically-named "Fantastic Beasts," a group of young wizards who, after being attacked by a monster named "Lord Voldemort," fled to the United States, only to be followed by a group of very-magical-looking, flying cars. The story follows Harry Potter, a young wizard who is initially reluctant to accept the role of a wizard, but eventually accepts it and is drawn into the world of wizardry, where he meets a number of friends and enemies.
